{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03465v1", "title": "Homology of Yang-Baxter modules", "summary": "We study the Yang-Baxter operator for the vector representation $V_m$ of the
quantum group $U_q(sl_m)$. We consider the one-term Yang-Baxter homology with
coefficients in $V_m$-modules and provide a direct sum decomposition of the one
term Yang-Baxter chain complex. The homology is explicitly computed for some
specific $V_m$-modules.", "main_category": "math.QA", "categories": "math.QA", "published": "2025-05-06T12:06:44Z"}
